block.p: Simone Bergstein, a daughter of Bobette and Martin Bergstein of Great Neck, N.Y., was married last evening to Craig Michael Wiener, a son of Sherry and Fred Wiener of Westport, Conn. Rabbi Mordecai Waxman performed the ceremony at Temple Israel in Great Neck, N.Y.

The bride, 30, is a buyer for Lord & Taylor in New York. She graduated from the University of Rochester. Her father is a partner in Baron, Bergstein & Weinberg, accountants in New York. Her mother retired as a marketing project director in New York for the Pepsi-Cola Company.

The bride, 30, is a buyer for Lord & Taylor in New York. She graduated from the University of Rochester. Her father is a partner in Baron, Bergstein & Weinberg, accountants in New York. Her mother retired as a marketing project director in New York for the Pepsi-Cola Company.

The bridegroom, 28, is a foreign exchange trader at Chase Manhattan Bank in New York. He graduated cum laude from Syracuse University. His mother is a broker with Raveis Realty in Westport. His father is a president of Vision Capital, a finance company in Stamford, Conn.
